messages: b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:03): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: I'm about to land validator support for HTML5+ARIA+SVG+MathML as the default. are you OK with it becoming the default in the W3C instance of V.nu, too?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (15:07): I think in general the W3C instance should remain in sync with v.nu upstream
73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46 (15:20): http://twitter.com/erikdahlstrom/statuses/13841075917
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:21): "Warning: this may kill your browser, as it's quite an unoptimised script."
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:21): Seems like an unfair comparison

b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:24): (although it would be surprising if SVG filters, implemented in C++ and potentially GPU accelerated weren't faster than javascript manipulating pixels on a canvas)
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (15:24): That canvas demo looks like it'll fail if getImageData doesn't return 1 pixel per CSS pixel
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (15:25): Hmm, it even loops over x/y in the wrong order
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (15:25): (Wrong in terms of performance)
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:30): argh. SVN keeps rejecting my login
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:31): I reset my password. twice. still rejecting the new password
73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46 (15:31): SVN is having a break eating ice cream
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:33): works on Mac from within Eclipse
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:33): IIRC, Mike had experienced trouble with debian svn
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:34): maybe the Ubuntu package inherits brokenness from Debian
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:34): it's 9:30PM in Tokyo
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:34): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 is barely awake then
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:34): guess he might be online later due to weird telcon hours
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:34): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea, he's awake surprisingly often
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:41): finds http://krijnhoetmer.nl/irc-logs/whatwg/20090603#l-626
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:46): command-line svn on Mac worked, too
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:47): though I got a post-commit hook error from the server
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:48): ok. I guess this was a server-side problem
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:48): not I managed to commit from Ubuntu
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:48): and I got the same post-commit hook error
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:53): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: No, I meant has barely woken up yet :)
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:53): He seems to be a night owl
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:54): fyi, I was in Tokyo the last three weeks staying at his place
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:55): there's something scary and frustrating about being locked out of version control
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:02): validator.nu went down for a libc update
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:05): time zones are a huge FAIL
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:05): it's ridiculous how often the tzdata package gets updated
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:06): OK. validator.nu and html5.validator.nu now support HTML5+ARIA+SVG+MathML
73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46 (16:07): http://validator.nu/?doc=http%3A%2F%2Fhsivonen.iki.fi%2Ftest%2Fmoz%2Fhtml5-hacks-demo.html&showsource=yes
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:07): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: I landed HTML5+ARIA+SVG+MathML
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (16:08): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: you planning to blog about it?
